name: HH_EPSD_SURG_PROC_HX
description: This table contains audit history for surgical procedures.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ICD_PROC_ID
columns.description: Auditing history for surgical procedure IDs.

columns.name: ICD_PROC_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.

columns.name: SURG_PROC_COMMENT_HX
columns.description: Auditing history for comments on surgical procedures.

columns.name: SURG_PROC_HX_DATE
columns.description: Auditing history for the dates of surgical procedures.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: Auditing history for the ID of the user who edited the surgical procedure data.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Auditing history of the instant surgical procedure data was edited.

columns.name: EDIT_LINE
columns.description: Auditing history of the specific line number of the procedure that had its data edited. This is the line number found in column LINE of HH_EPSD_SURG_PROC_HX.
